pr_title: Handle missing listeners config in CruiseControlMetricsReporter

timeline.message: Handle missing listeners config in CruiseControlMetricsReporter

timeline.bodyText: Since this change is not backward compatible in a way that it does not handle the listeners == null case. So, is  listeners guaranteed never to be null?
timeline.author: Lincong

replies.bodyText: Correct, String.valueOf(...) does not return null, but can return "null"
replies.author: efeg
